snippet: No. 3 Villanova smothered Providence’s stars Ben Bentil and Kris Dunn on defense, earning a 76-68 victory in the semifinals of the Big East tournament at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Seton Hall defeats Xavier 87-83,  advancing to first Big East tournament title appearance since 1993; other men's college basketball scores.
lead_paragraph: No. 3 Villanova smothered Providence’s stars Ben Bentil and Kris Dunn on defense, earning a 76-68 victory in the semifinals of the Big East tournament at Madison Square Garden.

headline.print_headline: Villanova to Face Seton Hall in Title Game
headline.main: Villanova to Face Seton Hall in Title Game
